data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: There are many rewarding careers. For example, being an early childhood educator could be very rewarding because seeing children's progress would make these teachers feel meaningful and helpful. Their impacts on children today could help shape a better future for these youngsters. Being a medical professional could be rewarding because they help save a life. For example, when a patient gets fully recovered, staff in the hospital would be very pleased to see their final outcomes. This could help medical professionals achieve a sense of accomplishment from work.
data.referenceText: What are some examples of rewarding careers? Give reasons to support your answer.
data.referenceTranslate: 给出一些有价值的事业的例子，并给出理由来支持你的答案。
